mapper.select: select * from project.board order by regdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into project.board (title, contents, regdate) values(#{title}, #{contents}, now())
mapper.select: select * from project.board where id_board=2 order by regdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into project.board (title, contents, image, regdate, id_board) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{image}, now(), #{id_board})
